panels.title: Validator Golden Timer

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    vi.moniker, 
    COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 1 THEN 1 END) AS missed,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 2 THEN 1 END) AS commited,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 3 THEN 1 END) AS proposed
FROM voteindexer_${table_chain_id} vidx
JOIN meta.validator_info vi ON vidx.validator_hex_address_id = vi.id
WHERE height > ((SELECT MAX(height) FROM voteindexer_${table_chain_id}) - 100)
GROUP BY vi.moniker
order by missed desc

;  -- Order in ascending order for the last 100 blocks
WITH max_height AS (
  SELECT MAX(height) AS highest_height
  FROM voteindexer_${table_chain_id}
)
SELECT
  vidx.height,
  vidx.status,
  vi.moniker AS moniker
FROM
  voteindexer_${table_chain_id} vidx
JOIN
  meta.validator_info vi
  ON vidx.validator_hex_address_id = vi.id
JOIN
  max_height mh  -- Join to get the maximum block height
  ON vidx.height BETWEEN (mh.highest_height - 100) AND mh.highest_height
ORDER by
  vidx.height ASC
